name: Diagnosis Related Group
description: Contains DRG assignment and reimbursement information for hospital billing and case classification

DRG.1.name: Diagnostic Related Group
DRG.1.description: DRG code assigned to this case

DRG.2.name: DRG Assigned Date/Time
DRG.2.description: Date and time when DRG was assigned

DRG.3.name: DRG Approval Indicator
DRG.3.description: Indicates if DRG assignment was approved

DRG.4.name: DRG Grouper Review Code
DRG.4.description: Review code from DRG grouper software

DRG.5.name: Outlier Type
DRG.5.description: Type of outlier for DRG classification

DRG.6.name: Outlier Days
DRG.6.description: Number of outlier days beyond DRG threshold

DRG.7.name: Outlier Cost
DRG.7.description: Cost associated with outlier days or procedures

DRG.10.name: Confidential Indicator
DRG.10.description: Indicates if DRG information is confidential

notes: All DRG fields are optional but provide important reimbursement information
Used with DG1 and other clinical segments for case mix classification
Critical for hospital reimbursement and quality reporting
